problem.markdown:
1. Molecular weight of a R enantiomer is __________ than that of S enantiomer. () Higher (x) Equal () Lower () can not say
2. In normal ORD spectra there are ___ maxima and __ minima. () 1,2 () 1,1 (x) 0,0 () 0,1
3. Octant rule determines __________ of Cotton effect in ketones. () magnitude (x) sign () probability () frequency
4. Abnormal ORD is observed when _________ is present in a chiral environment. (x) chromophore () asymmetry center () chiral center () none of the above
5. At the absorption peak an anomalous ORD curve _____________. () reaches minimum (x) crosses the base line () reaches maximum () none of the above
problem.p: 1. Molecular weight of a R enantiomer is __________ than that of S enantiomer.
2. In normal ORD spectra there are ___ maxima and __ minima.
3. Octant rule determines __________ of Cotton effect in ketones.
4. Abnormal ORD is observed when _________ is present in a chiral environment.
5. At the absorption peak an anomalous ORD curve _____________.
